Traits.Name: Ominous Presence
Traits.Content: Creatures that start their turn within 30 feet of the Mothman must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened until the start of their next turn.

Traits.Name: Evasive Maneuvers
Traits.Content: The Mothman can take the Disengage action as a bonus action on its turn.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The Mothman makes two Wing Buffet attacks and one Claw attack.

Actions.Name: Claw
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) slashing damage. The target must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened until the end of their next turn.

Actions.Name: Wing Buffet
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage. The target must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be pushed 10 feet away from the Mothman.

Actions.Name: Ominous Gaze
Actions.Content: The Mothman targets one creature it can see within 60 feet. The target must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be incapacitated until the end of its next turn, as it is overwhelmed by the terror of the Mothman's gaze.
